about_the_game:
Do you want to give extra support to the developer of the game? This DLC is for you!
It won’t give you any unfair advantages, Magic Pants of Fanciness +1, or even extra gold, but it’s a great way to show your appreciation for the author.

As a humble thank you, this Supporter Pack offers some unique cosmetics:

  • Your glowing god hand in the main menu: A reminder of who holds the true power in the game (that’s you!).

  • The glow follows you everywhere: Your hand-cursor will sparkle and glow inside the game too!

By purchasing this pack, you’re primarily supporting the creator of Zero Orders Tactics and encouraging his future game design experiments.

By purchasing this pack, you’re primarily supporting the creator of Zero Orders Tactics and encouraging his future game design experiments.

short_description: Show your support for Zero Orders Tactics with this cosmetic pack! It features an alternative main menu background and a new mouse cursor to show everyone who holds true power in the game (yes, that’s you!)
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
